*QGIS support for activities throughout the Peatland Restoration Practitioners course.*
:::

We will be using QGIS to develop GIS skills useful for Peatland Restoration. Before the course, please ensure you have reviewed some of the tutorial resources to familiarise yourself with the software, but don't worry, we will cover all the basics with you!\
\
The categories in the navigation bar at the top of the screen will take you to a brief overview of the skills covered in the GIS modules of the course.
